channel.title: Need help changing all ancent spells from multi to singular
channel.description: Alright My pk place is at mage arena and I have made a safe zone and added tress and stuff to make it look cool. The problem is if people blood barrirage and barriage and stuff (the mutli spells) it attacks people in the safe zone its really annoying does anyone know how I can chnage these spells to singluar insted of mutli, thanks
